Pattern Design
Front Store Preview

1 min
on the store front, customers can begin by selecting product options for the pattern creator products as they would for any print product, then move to the personalize design tab in the price calculator, pattern products now feature a color option with four settings none , 1 color image , 1 color background , and 2 colors (image and background) with the none option, the uploaded image is used as is, without the ability to change colors once an image is uploaded, customers can access various pattern creation options, including full drop (default), half drop , mirror , or normal (where a single image is centered and stretched across the width) additionally, customers can make adjustments to refine their design these include image scaling to modify design size, position adjustments to shift the image to top, bottom, right, or left, rotation in 30 degree increments (left or right), and horizontal and vertical spacing for precise layout control after creating the pattern, customers can preview it in 2d or 3d , based on models assigned in the real preview section for the 1 color image option, the image loads in black by default, and customers can select a custom color from the color box the real time preview will update in the image gallery for 2 colors (image and background) , two color boxes are available one to modify the image color and another for the background this allows customers to fully customize their designs before finalizing once the pattern is ready, customers can proceed to checkout
